articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: What have England learned this summer?
articles.description: At the end of the busiest summer for women's cricket, BBC Sport looks at the positives and negatives from a season like no other.
articles.content:
This has been a summer like no other for women's cricket in England.
England finish their home summer having drawn a Test match, won six of their eight one-day internationals and lost only two of th… [+5516 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: England’s Moeen Ali calls time on Test cricket career
articles.description: All-rounder says he hopes his playing achievements can inspire other British Muslims to represent England.
articles.content:
England all-rounder Moeen Ali has announced his retirement from Test cricket, saying he hopes his achievements can inspire other British Muslims to play for their country.
Ali, 34, scored 2,914 runs… [+2244 chars]
